description:
Ready for a new way of getting to know people? Get LOVOO's Live Radar for your smartphone now and find people nearby to connect with! Millions are already using it!

You'll love it! Rated as one of the top social discovery networks for it's sleek interface and ability show people in your direct vicinity, LOVOO opens up a world of possibilities. Try it out now and discover that with LOVOO, unrequited winks in a cafe or fruitless attempts at starting conversations in clubs can be a thing of the past!

[How it works]
√ Register for free via Facebook, Twitter or e-mail!
√ Use the Live Radar to check out who's nearby
√ Upload your best pics
√ Get a Match and start a chat

The Live Radar updates in real-time so you can quickly contact people who catch your eye- they might be just a few streets away. Find out what's going on at your favorite club before you're even there. Chat and meet up in a cozy cafe. Find the person who makes your heart beat faster.

Your PRIVACY and SAFETY are very important to us. You alone decide when you want to reveal your location and who you connect with. Our popular verification feature provides all LOVOO users with the certainty that a chat partner really is the person shown in the profile.

YOUR SUPPORT TEAM
LOVOO is one of the best rated apps and we'd love to get your feedback to make it even better. Do you have questions regarding LOVOO or have great ideas for improvements? Our support team is always available for you. Just send us an email at support@lovoo.com


The app is free to download and use. We also offer an optional VIP subscription package.    

VIP Service Conditions:
- Payment will be charged to your iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase . 
- Your subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current billing period.
- Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current billing period 
- You can manage your subscription and switch off the auto-renewal by accessing your Account Settings after purchase  
- You cannot cancel the current subscription during the active subscription period. 
- Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited, if you purchase a subscription to that publication. 
- The VIP subscription has a minimum length of 1 month ($12.99/month) up to 1 year ($79.99/year). 
- All personal data is handled under the terms and conditions of LOVOO's privacy policy. More details can be found here: http://static.lovoo.net/legal/en/
trackCensoredName: LOVOO – The New Free Chat App for finding Singles and Love via Dating Flirt Radar
trackName: LOVOO – The New Free Chat App for finding Singles and Love via Dating Flirt Radar
releaseNotes:
Have you noticed that your iPhone, iPad or iPod touch hasn’t spoken to you the way it used to do before the update 2.5.5? Its display remained dark and empty, a once so joyful relationship turned into something complicated.

‚What happened?‘ you might ask yourself… Let me tell you: A mean bug forced itself between you two and simply deactivated all messages from LOVOO. Or maybe your cell phone got jealous and refused to tell you about all visits, kisses and matches, not forwarding chats out of spite – but that’s a different story. ;-)

We have taken care of the issue and will let you know twice as fast about any LOVOO news. Notifications ahoi!

Spontaneous marriage proposals can be sent via Tweet @lovoo!
